Class MonteurService

Namespace
IbeAppWeb.Services
Assembly
IbeAppWeb.dll

Provides services for managing Monteur resources, including retrieval, creation, updating, and deletion operations.

public class MonteurService
Inheritance
object
MonteurService
Inherited Members

object.ToString()

Remarks

This service interacts with a backend API to perform operations related to Monteur entities. It handles HTTP requests and responses, including error handling and data serialization. Ensure that the HttpClient is properly configured and the API endpoints are accessible.

Constructors

MonteurService(HttpClient) 

public MonteurService(HttpClient httpClient)

Parameters

httpClient HttpClient

Methods

AssignMonteurToAnlage(AssignMonteurToAnlageDto)

Assigns a Monteur to an Anlage based on the provided data transfer object (DTO).

public Task<MonteurWithAnlageDto?> AssignMonteurToAnlage(AssignMonteurToAnlageDto dto)

Parameters

dto AssignMonteurToAnlageDto

The data transfer object containing the details required to assign a Monteur to an Anlage.

Returns

Task<MonteurWithAnlageDto>

A MonteurWithAnlageDto object containing the details of the assigned Monteur and Anlage if the operation is successful; otherwise, null.

Remarks

This method sends an HTTP POST request to the endpoint api/monteur/assign-to-anlage with the provided DTO as the request body. Ensure that the AssignMonteurToAnlageDto object is properly populated before calling this method.

Exceptions

HttpRequestException

Thrown if the HTTP request to assign the Monteur to the Anlage fails. The exception message includes the HTTP status code and error details.

CreateMonteur(MonteurResponse, Dictionary<string, string>)

Asynchronously creates a new Monteur by sending the provided data to the server.

public Task<MonteurResponse?> CreateMonteur(MonteurResponse Dto, Dictionary<string, string> fieldErrors)

Parameters

Dto MonteurResponse

The MonteurResponse object containing the data to be sent for creating a new Monteur.

fieldErrors Dictionary<string, string>

A dictionary to store validation errors, if any, returned by the server. The keys are the field names, and the values are the corresponding error messages.

Returns

Task<MonteurResponse>

A task representing the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the created MonteurResponse if the operation is successful; otherwise, null if there are validation errors.

Remarks

If the server returns a Bad Request status, any validation errors are added to the fieldErrors dictionary.

Exceptions

HttpRequestException

Thrown if the request fails due to server errors or network issues.

DeleteMonteur(int)

Deletes a Monteur resource identified by the specified ID.

public Task<bool> DeleteMonteur(int Id)

Parameters

Id int

The unique identifier of the Monteur to delete. Must be a positive integer.

Returns

Task<bool>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result is true if the deletion is successful; otherwise, false.

Remarks

This method sends an HTTP DELETE request to the server to remove the specified Monteur. Ensure the provided ID is valid and the server is reachable.

Exceptions

HttpRequestException

Thrown if the HTTP request to delete the Monteur fails, including details about the status code and error content.

GetAllMonteure()

Asynchronously retrieves a collection of all Monteure.

public Task<IEnumerable<MonteurResponse>> GetAllMonteure()

Returns

Task<IEnumerable<MonteurResponse>>

A task representing the asynchronous operation. The task result contains an IEnumerable<T> of MonteurResponse objects representing the Monteure. Returns an empty collection if the request fails.

Remarks

This method sends an HTTP GET request to the "api/monteur" endpoint to fetch the data. If the request is successful, it returns a collection of MonteurResponse objects. In case of a failure, an empty collection is returned.

Exceptions

HttpRequestException

Thrown if the HTTP request to fetch Monteure fails with a non-success status code.

GetMonteurAnlageHistory(int)

Retrieves the history of a specific Monteur Anlage based on the provided Monteur ID.

public Task<MonteurAnlageHistoryDto?> GetMonteurAnlageHistory(int monteurId)

Parameters

monteurId int

The unique identifier of the Monteur whose Anlage history is to be retrieved.

Returns

Task<MonteurAnlageHistoryDto>

A MonteurAnlageHistoryDto containing the history details if the request is successful; otherwise, null.

Remarks

This method sends an asynchronous HTTP GET request to the specified API endpoint to retrieve the Monteur Anlage history. If the request is unsuccessful, an exception is thrown with details of the failure.

Exceptions

HttpRequestException

Thrown if the HTTP request to fetch the Monteur Anlage history fails.

GetMonteurProjects()

Asynchronously retrieves a list of Monteur projects.

public Task<List<ProjectMonteurDto>> GetMonteurProjects()

Returns

Task<List<ProjectMonteurDto>>

A task representing the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a list of ProjectMonteurDto objects representing the Monteur projects. Returns an empty list if the request fails.

Remarks

This method sends an HTTP GET request to the specified API endpoint to fetch Monteur projects. If the request is successful, it returns a list of ProjectMonteurDto objects. In case of an error, an empty list is returned, and the error is logged to the console.

Exceptions

HttpRequestException

Thrown if the HTTP request to fetch Monteur projects fails with a non-success status code.

GetMonteurWithAnlage()

Asynchronously retrieves a list of Monteur with their associated Anlage data.

public Task<List<MonteurWithAnlageDto>> GetMonteurWithAnlage()

Returns

Task<List<MonteurWithAnlageDto>>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a list of MonteurWithAnlageDto objects. If the request fails, the list will be empty.

Remarks

This method sends an HTTP GET request to the "api/monteur/with-anlagen" endpoint. If the request is successful, it returns a list of MonteurWithAnlageDto objects. If the request fails, it logs the error and returns an empty list.

Exceptions

HttpRequestException

Thrown if the HTTP request to fetch Monteure with Anlage fails.

RemoveAnlageFromMonteur(int)

Removes the assignment of an "Anlage" from a specified "Monteur".

public Task<bool> RemoveAnlageFromMonteur(int monteurId)

Parameters

monteurId int

The unique identifier of the "Monteur" from whom the "Anlage" assignment is to be removed.

Returns

Task<bool>

true if the assignment was successfully removed; otherwise, false.

Exceptions

HttpRequestException

Thrown if the HTTP request to remove the assignment fails, including details of the status code and error message.

UpdateMonteur(MonteurResponse)

Updates the details of a specified Monteur using the provided data transfer object.

public Task<MonteurResponse?> UpdateMonteur(MonteurResponse dto)

Parameters

dto MonteurResponse

The MonteurResponse object containing the updated details of the Monteur.

Returns

Task<MonteurResponse>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the updated MonteurResponse if the update is successful; otherwise, null.

Remarks

This method sends an HTTP PUT request to update the Monteur's details on the server. Ensure that the dto contains valid and complete information for the Monteur to be updated.

Exceptions

HttpRequestException

Thrown if the HTTP request to update the Monteur fails.
